author: Yuan Yuan   元媛
description:
If time could be reserved, what would you want to save?

A crash brought her back to the age of sixteen.

That year, she had fallen in love with him at first sight…

Since the Heavens gave her a chance to start over, she decided not to be a coward anymore.

She had only dared to secretly love him in her heart.

This time, she would use all kinds of methods to make him fall in love with her!

Despite all the plot and development, she could anticipate everything, including his perception of her, which has always been disgust.

When the two get together, they always fight each other like wild animals.

She knew that he would only leave her scarred and bruised, but this was her choice.

She didn’t regret it.

It was just that if you loved someone for too long, you would get tired.

The saddest thing was that no matter how hard she tried, the ending of the story would not change…>
